DOC.detailed_description: This prospective traditional feasibility study evaluate Cartiva® SCI CMC treatment first carpometacarpal joint osteoarthritis.The objective clinical study evaluate safety effectiveness Cartiva® SCI CMC term pain relief improvement joint function treatment first CMC OA evaluate Cartiva® SCI CMC device performance order establish parameter pivotal trial . Follow visit occur follow time point surgical procedure : 14 day , 42 day , 90 day , 180 day , 1 year . Data summarize use descriptive statistic . Continuous variable summarize use number observation , mean , standard deviation , median , range appropriate . Categorical value summarize use number observation percentage appropriate . Chi‐square Fisher exact test use comparison categorical data . Paired t‐tests use comparison continuous data . For statistical testing , alpha 0.05 use acceptance standard test conduct two tail . Also , 95 % confidence interval mean value proportion value provide appropriate . Since feasibility study formal hypothesis test , p‐values report without adjustment multiple comparison . All analysis conduct use SAS version 9.1 later .
